Race.SpecificTitle: Hospital Service Dist. No. 1 -- 7.47 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Hospital Service District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 years, 7.47 mills tax continuation for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating hospital equipment and facilities for the District and providing matching funds for energy conservation measures.
Race.FullText: Shall Hospital Service District No. 1 of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a tax of seven and forty-seven hundredths (7.47) mills on all the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $560,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating hospital equipment and facilities for the District and providing matching funds for energy conservation measures, said millage to represent a forty-seven hundredths of a mill (.47) increase over the 7 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2011 pursuant to an election held on October 20, 2001?
